name: @hmcts/nfdiv-case-definition
description: Utility to help creating CCD config definitions

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run genCaseTypeConsts && npm run genCitizenEventNameConsts && npm run genCommonEventNameConsts && npm run genSystemEventNameConsts
scripts.genCaseTypeConsts: grep -rh "public static final String" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/divorce/divorcecase/NoFaultDivorce.java | sed "s/    public static final String/export const/" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
scripts.genCitizenEventNameConsts: grep -rh "public static final String" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/divorce/citizen/event | sed "s/    public static final String/export const/" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
scripts.genCommonEventNameConsts: grep -rh "public static final String" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/divorce/common/event | sed "s/    public static final String/export const/" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
scripts.genSystemEventNameConsts: grep -rh "public static final String" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/divorce/systemupdate/event | sed "s/    public static final String/export const/" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
